      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(java.lang.Void v)
        After execution, wait until the minimum amount of time to display the splash screen and if appropriate, display the remediation dialog. If everything went fine, redirect to ProjectsListingActivity. If the application could not be initialized, redirect to the login activity.
        Parameters:
        v - Nothing
